name: Devotion: Engine Waltz
description:
Currently in alpha. No music or SFX assets at the moment. All artwork is provisional.

To play, click or drag on the cards and icons.

 While the game is in pre-release state, your save file is not guaranteed to work between builds. If I plan on releasing a new build, I will make the release on Sunday, so finish your game play sessions before Sunday if you do not want to lose your save files.

Note, the game on  Itch.io is a wrapper around the GitHub Pages site, so update data on Itch.io is misleading.

At the current moment, I'm not interested in supporting a user base, but balance feedback is appreciated.

As of 4/1/2023, I currently estimate that the game will be completed around the end of 2025.

Donate money only if you want me to able to commission art and music assets for the game.
